Room.Name: Bottom of Driveway
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of a driveway. There is a mid-sized ranch house to the north, with a large front yard and some trees and bushes.

Item.name: house
Item.Description: The house has brick walls with white sidings. The plants are thriving and the windows clean, but there is no sign of anyone living here.
Item.OnPickupFail: It is a house. You cannot pick up the house.

Room.Name: Top of Driveway
Room.Description: You are now directly in front of the house. The driveway is full of cracks and the house looks abandoned. There is a path to the backyard to the north, as well as a mailbox next to the front door. A basketball hoop is mounted on the house.

Item.name: basketball
Item.Description: It is round and orange with bumps all over.
Item.RoomDescriptionAddition: A basketball sits dejectedly on the side of the driveway.

Item.name: house
Item.Description: Even up close, the house looks pristine.
Item.OnPickupFail: It is a house. You cannot pick up the house.

Item.name: mailbox
Item.OnPickupFail: Unfortunately, the mailbox is cemented into the ground, and you cannot lift it.

Action.OnSuccess: After some awkward jimmying, you manage to open the mailbox. Unfortunately, your lockpick breaks in the process.

Item.name: broken lockpick
Item.Description: A broken lockpick. You almost dropped it, but something made you hold on to it.

Action.DescriptionChange: The mailbox is open, but empty.

Item.name: basketball hoop
Item.Description: It' a standard, run-of-the-mill basketball hoop.
Item.OnPickupFail: You seem to have forgotten your ladder, so you can't take the basketball hoop.

Action.OnSuccess: You shoot some hoops with the basketball.
Action.DescriptionChange: It' a standard, run-of-the-mill basketball hoop. You feel more attached to it now that you had a moment.
